tool_description: Get hot play to earn blockchain games! Filter by popular blockchains
title: Play to Earn Blockchain Games

api_list.name: Games
api_list.description:
To get a games list make a POST request with JSON object. 
Examplary JSON:
{
    "pageNumber": 1,
    "pageSize": 10,
    "isOrderByCreatedTime": true,
    "platform": "iOS",
    "blockchain": "ethereum",
    "genre": "action"
}

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://play-to-earn-blockchain-games.p.rapidapi.com/project/get-games"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "play-to-earn-blockchain-games.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://play-to-earn-blockchain-games.p.rapidapi.com/project/get-games"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "play-to-earn-blockchain-games.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
